description: Blogger is a blog-publishing service that allows multi-user blogs with time-stamped entries.

blocks.name: getAccessToken
blocks.description: getAccessToken

blocks.name: getBlogById
blocks.description: Retrieves a blog by its ID.

args.name: maxPosts
args.info: Maximum number of posts to retrieve along with the blog. When this parameter is not specified, no posts will be returned as part of the blog resource.

blocks.name: getBlogByUrl
blocks.description: Retrieves a blog by its url.

blocks.name: listUserBlogs
blocks.description: Retrieves a list of blogs.

args.name: fetchUserInfo
args.info: Whether the response is a list of blogs with per-user information instead of just blogs.

args.name: view
args.info: Acceptable values are: "ADMIN": Admin level detail "AUTHOR": Author level detail "READER": Admin level detail

blocks.name: listPostComments
blocks.description: Retrieves the list of comments for a post.

args.name: endDate
args.info: Latest date of comment to fetch

args.name: fetchBodies
args.info: Whether the body content of the comments is included.

args.name: maxResults
args.info: Maximum number of comments to include in the result.

args.name: pageToken
args.info: Continuation token if request is paged.

args.name: startDate
args.info: Earliest date of comment to fetch

args.name: view
args.info: Acceptable values are: "ADMIN": Admin level detail "AUTHOR": Author level detail "READER": Admin level detail

args.name: status
args.info: Acceptable values are: "emptied": Comments that have had their content removed "live": Comments that are publicly visible "pending": Comments that are awaiting administrator approval "spam": Comments marked as spam by the administrator

blocks.name: getPostComment
blocks.description: Retrieves one comment resource by its commentId.

blocks.name: approvePostComment
blocks.description: Marks a comment as not spam.

blocks.name: deletePostComment
blocks.description: Delete a comment by ID.

blocks.name: listBlogComments
blocks.description: Retrieves the comments for a blog, across all posts, possibly filtered.

args.name: endDate
args.info: Latest date of comment to fetch

args.name: fetchBodies
args.info: Whether the body content of the comments is included.

args.name: maxResults
args.info: Maximum number of comments to include in the result.

args.name: pageToken
args.info: Continuation token if request is paged.

args.name: startDate
args.info: Earliest date of comment to fetch

blocks.name: markCommentAsSpam
blocks.description: Marks a comment as spam. This will set the status of the comment to spam, and hide it in the default comment rendering.

blocks.name: removeCommentContent
blocks.description: Removes the content of a comment.

blocks.name: listBlogPages
blocks.description: Retrieves the list of pages for a blog.

args.name: fetchBodies
args.info: Whether the body content of the comments is included.

args.name: view
args.info: Acceptable values are: "ADMIN": Admin level detail "AUTHOR": Author level detail "READER": Admin level detail

args.name: status
args.info: Acceptable values are: "draft": Draft (unpublished) Pages "imported": Pages that have had their content removed "live": Pages that are publicly visible

blocks.name: getSinglePage
blocks.description: Retrieves one pages resource by its page ID.

args.name: view
args.info: Acceptable values are: "ADMIN": Admin level detail "AUTHOR": Author level detail "READER": Admin level detail

blocks.name: deleteSinglePage
blocks.description: Deletes one pages resource by its page ID.

blocks.name: addPage
blocks.description: Add a page.

blocks.name: partPageUpdate
blocks.description: Update existing page partly only with data you provide

args.name: publish
args.info: Whether to publish page or not

args.name: revert
args.info: Whether to revert page or not

blocks.name: fullPageUpdate
blocks.description: Update existing page partly with data you provide. All empty fields will be cleared

args.name: publish
args.info: Whether to publish page or not

args.name: revert
args.info: Whether to revert page or not

blocks.name: listPosts
blocks.description: Retrieves a list of posts.

args.name: endDate
args.info: Latest date of post to fetch

args.name: fetchBodies
args.info: Whether the body content of the post is included.

args.name: fetchImages
args.info: Whether image URL metadata for each post is included.

args.name: labels
args.info: Array of labels to search for

args.name: maxResults
args.info: Maximum number of comments to include in the result.

args.name: pageToken
args.info: Continuation token if request is paged.

args.name: startDate
args.info: Earliest date of comment to fetch

args.name: view
args.info: Acceptable values are: "ADMIN": Admin level detail "AUTHOR": Author level detail "READER": Admin level detail

args.name: status
args.info: Acceptable values are: "draft": Draft posts "live": Published posts "scheduled": Posts that are scheduled to publish in future.

blocks.name: getSinglePostById
blocks.description: Retrieves one post by post ID.

args.name: maxComments
args.info: Maximum number of comments to retrieve as part of the the post resource. If this parameter is left unspecified, then no comments will be returned.

args.name: view
args.info: Acceptable values are: "ADMIN": Admin level detail "AUTHOR": Author level detail "READER": Admin level detail

args.name: fetchBody
args.info: Whether the body content of the post is included.

args.name: fetchImages
args.info: Whether image URL metadata for each post is included.

blocks.name: searchPosts
blocks.description: Searches for a post that matches the given query terms.

args.name: fetchBodies
args.info: Whether the body content of the post is included.

args.name: orderBy
args.info: The sort order applied to the search results.

blocks.name: addPost
blocks.description: Add a post.

args.name: fetchBody
args.info: Whether the body content of the post is included.

args.name: fetchImages
args.info: Whether image URL metadata for each post is included.

args.name: labels
args.info: Array of labels to search for

args.name: titleLink
args.info: The title link URL, similar to atom's related link.

blocks.name: deletePost
blocks.description: Deletes one post by post ID.

blocks.name: getSinglePostByPath
blocks.description: Retrieves one post by post path.

args.name: maxComments
args.info: Maximum number of comments to retrieve as part of the the post resource. If this parameter is left unspecified, then no comments will be returned.

args.name: view
args.info: Acceptable values are: "ADMIN": Admin level detail "AUTHOR": Author level detail "READER": Admin level detail

blocks.name: partPostUpdate
blocks.description: Updates a post with information provided

args.name: fetchBody
args.info: Whether the body content of the post is included.

args.name: fetchImages
args.info: Whether image URL metadata for each post is included.

args.name: labels
args.info: Array of labels to search for

args.name: titleLink
args.info: The title link URL, similar to atom's related link.

args.name: publish
args.info: Whether to publish page or not

args.name: revert
args.info: Whether to revert page or not

args.name: maxComments
args.info: Maximum number of comments to retrieve as part of the the post resource. If this parameter is left unspecified, then no comments will be returned.

blocks.name: fullPostUpdate
blocks.description: Updates a post with information provided, non-provided fields are removed

args.name: fetchBody
args.info: Whether the body content of the post is included.

args.name: fetchImages
args.info: Whether image URL metadata for each post is included.

args.name: labels
args.info: Array of labels to search for

args.name: titleLink
args.info: The title link URL, similar to atom's related link.

args.name: publish
args.info: Whether to publish page or not

args.name: revert
args.info: Whether to revert page or not

args.name: maxComments
args.info: Maximum number of comments to retrieve as part of the the post resource. If this parameter is left unspecified, then no comments will be returned.

blocks.name: publishPost
blocks.description: Publish a draft post.

args.name: publishDate
args.info: The date and time to schedule the publishing of the Post.

blocks.name: revertPost
blocks.description: Revert a published or scheduled post to draft state, which removes the post from the publicly viewable content.

blocks.name: getUserInfo
blocks.description: Retrieves a user by user ID.

blocks.name: getBlogUserInfo
blocks.description: Gets one blog and user info pair by blogId and userId.

args.name: maxPosts
args.info: Maximum number of posts to pull back with the blog.

blocks.name: getBlogPageViews
blocks.description: Retrieve pageview stats for a Blog.

args.name: range
args.info: Acceptable values are: "30DAYS": Page view counts from the last thirty days. "7DAYS": Page view counts from the last seven days. "all": Total page view counts from all time.

blocks.name: getPostUserInfo
blocks.description: Gets one post and user info pair by postId and userId.

args.name: maxComments
args.info: Maximum number of comments to pull back with the post.

blocks.name: listPostUserInfo
blocks.description: Retrieves a list of post and post user info pairs, possibly filtered. The post user info contains per-user information about the post, such as access rights, specific to the user.

args.name: endDate
args.info: Latest date of post to fetch

args.name: fetchBodies
args.info: Whether the body content of the post is included.

args.name: fetchImages
args.info: Whether image URL metadata for each post is included.

args.name: labels
args.info: Array of labels to search for

args.name: maxResults
args.info: Maximum number of comments to include in the result.

args.name: pageToken
args.info: Continuation token if request is paged.

args.name: startDate
args.info: Earliest date of comment to fetch

args.name: view
args.info: Acceptable values are: "ADMIN": Admin level detail "AUTHOR": Author level detail "READER": Admin level detail

args.name: status
args.info: Acceptable values are: "draft": Draft posts "live": Published posts "scheduled": Posts that are scheduled to publish in future.
